title: Instructional Design Process for Training Correctional Sports Education Specialists

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: A course strengthening the understanding of sports education's educational role in prisons and enhancing instructional design capabilities using direct teaching methods

learning_goals: Learners can describe three educational purposes and design processes of a prison sports program.
Learners can create an 8-week sports education plan incorporating the direct instruction method.
Learners can develop an oral assessment tool tailored to prison environments that passes validity verification at over 80%.
Learners can analyze five roles of professional sports educators based on European case studies.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
